text:
- Hi, I am Ed Anuff, the Chief
Product Officer of DataStax.
So DataStax is a database provider,
and gen AI relies on the database.

So gen AI has been a big
deal for us and our customers

that are trying to build
applications on top of their data.

Probably the biggest
misconception that we see
is that gen AI is really hard to do,
that it requires AI experts
or data scientists to do anything.
The great thing about gen AI is
that it's about building the applications

that your customers, your
users, are gonna interact with.
It's going to be built by
the developers that you have today.

So one of the biggest
challenges in building

a production AI system is
the security of your data.

And so you need to use
a secure cloud service
that can help you bring the data

to these user interactions in
a way that's going to be safe
for your business and your users' data.
So AWS supports us and our users

in moving fast and building
these applications.
AWS brings us everything we need

to be able to deliver this
cutting edge technology,
as we need it, at the scale

that's going to allow us
to grow as fast as we want.

So AWS helps DataStax
be scalable and nimble.
That ultimately makes us more competitive
and more able to serve our users.
(upbeat music)
